item.nzh-sem:metakeywords: Politics, NZ Government, Coronavirus, Health, National
item.title: Live: 'Dirty politics' - Government responds to National's Covid patient leak
item.description:
Revelations that a National MP and a former party president combined to leak confidential Covid patients' details have been branded "dirty politics" by the Government.
National MP Hamish Walker has been ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202028/Walker-Boag2_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=National MP Hamish Walker and former National Party President Michelle Boag have both come forward admitting roles in leaking Covid-19 patients' details to media. Photos / Supplied
https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202028/hamishwalker_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=National MP Hamish Walker has admitted leaking Covid patients' details.
